r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $6.8M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with CBCL. The average
  contract duration was 0.81 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $105.1K. The longest
  contract was 5.69 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $4.4M.

s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '102%'
